text: Abu Hurairah (603 â€“ 681), also known as Horayra, was a companion of Muhammad and he narrated the most hadiths in the Kutub al-Sittah.Shorter Urdu Encyclopedia of Islam, University of the Punjab, Lahore, 1997, pg. 65. ==Related pages== *Islam ==References== Category:603 births Category:681 deaths Category:Islamic religious leaders Category:History of Islam Category:Sahaba
